markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Skittering Scuttle](/Feats.aspx?ID=49) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Goblin" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=81" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 49 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Goblin Scuttle](/Feats.aspx?ID=41)

</column>

---

You can scuttle farther and faster when maneuvering alongside allies. When you use [Goblin Scuttle](/Feats.aspx?ID=41), you can Stride up to half your Speed instead of Stepping.
name: Skittering Scuttle
